output_list.reason: The mintToken function allows the owner to mint an arbitrary amount of tokens, causing an integer overflow in the totalSupply variable.
The claimThrone function allows a user to become the king if they send more ether than the current balance, causing an integer overflow in the balance variable.
The distribute function allows a user to distribute tokens to multiple recipients, causing an integer overflow in the totalAmount variable.
The PayWinner function selects a winner in a predictable manner, allowing attackers to manipulate the outcome and steal funds.
The MorphToken function unintentionally exposes the constructor, allowing any user to claim ownership and funds.
